name: Galunggong In Coconut Aminos
description: Indulge in the flavors of the Pacific with this healthful Galunggong In Coconut Aminos recipe. Perfect for anyone following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet, this dish is a flavorful and nutritious option that brings you closer to your health goals while satisfying your palate.
recipeIngredient: 250 g Data From Pacific Ocean Fisheries

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Data From Pacific Ocean Fisheries (Galunggong) under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Galunggong with 1 tsp of ground black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Once the oil is hot, add the seasoned Galunggong to the pan and cook for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle 4 tsp of Coconut Aminos over the Galunggong in the last minute of cooking, allowing it to glaze the fish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
